#Settings
For testing library builds, settings in the function
```{r}
#library name
Library = "Data/DBstuff/yeastprosit.msp"
FragmentationMode = "CID"
MassAnalyzer = "IT"
CollisionEnergy = "35"
Source = "Prosit"
TMTPro = TRUE
DBoutput = "YeastTestingProsit5.db"
```
